elements.title: News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol replaces six Cabinet ministers in a major reshuffle ahead of next year's general elections.) - 2023.12.04 PM5
News(Top News : Lee Dong-kwan, the embattled chief of the broadcasting watchdog, steps down ahead of a parliamentary vote on his impeachment.) - 2023.12.01 PM5
News(Top News : A former close aide to main opposition Democratic Party chair Lee Jae-myung has been sentenced to five years in prison for receiving illicit election contributions.) - 2023.11.30 PM5
News(Top News : Riyadh beats out Busan to become the host of the 2030 World Expo with more than two-thirds of BIE votes.) - 2023.11.29 PM5
News(Top News : The host city for the 2030 World Expo will be picked in Paris on Tuesday as South Korea wraps up its nine-year campaign.) - 2023.11.28 PM5
News(Top News : North Korea begins restoring frontline guard posts inside the Demilitarized Zone that were destroyed under an inter-Korean agreement in 2018.) - 2023.11.27 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol and French President Emmanuel Macron exchange views on North Korea and other pending security issues during their Paris summit.) - 2023.11.25 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol arrives in Paris to support Busan's bid to host the 2030 World Expo ahead of the final vote.) - 2023.11.24 PM5

News(Top News : North Korea says it too will no longer be bound by the 2018 inter-Korean military agreement a day after South Korea partially suspended the deal in response to Pyongyang's launch of a spy satellite.) - 2023.11.23 PM5
